thread.title: 5 Television Couples Who Love Their Pets More Than Anything!
thread.title_full: 5 Television Couples Who Love Their Pets More Than Anything!

title: 5 Television Couples Who Love Their Pets More Than Anything!
text:
facebook 605 SHARES 
Having a pet is like having unconditional love around you at all times. A pet becomes a member of your family, and because we love ours so much, here's a list of T.V couples that feel the same way; they have pets that are familial as well. overload. Be prepared to lose your hearts over these cute, adorable pictures of Indian T.V couples and their pets. Anusha Dandekar and Karan Kundra 
After watching them together in the show Love School, we think they are simply made for each other. Anusha and Karan are proud owners of their adorable little pup named Monster. Karan gifted Monster to Anusha and since then he has been an integral part of their lives. They are often spotted chilling with Monster by their side and looklook like one happy family. Ridhi Dogra and Raqesh Vashisht 
Rishi Dogra and Raqesh Vashisht are another television couple who are happily married. The two have three adorable pets; a beautiful Labrador, Eve, a Persian Chinchilla, Nemo and a Turkish Angora, Dori. We think they have an amazing family, no? Jay Bhanushali and Mahi Vij 
Tim Tim, Figo and Katori are the extended family members of Jai Bhanushali and Mahi Vij's clan. The couple is very connected to their dogs and simply cannot imagine their life without them. Gurmeet and Debina Choudhary 
Debina and Gurmeet brought a bundle of joy on the very first day they moved into their new home in Mumbai. The couple shares a dog Dexter, who is a brindle boxer. They two are very close to the dog and Dexter often accompanies them to their shoots. Karan Patel and Ankita Bhargava 
Karan Patel married to Ankita Bhargava last year, and she has two dogs and two kittens. Soon, Karan too became an animal lover. Ankita is also associated with an NGO, which takes care of stray dogs. After marriage, the couple adopted a chocolate-brown Labrador pup and named him Naughty. So cute! Photo Credit: BCCL
